articles.title: Need to show proof of vaccination? How to store a COVID-19 vaccine card on your smartphone - Medical Xpress
articles.description: As new variants of the COVID-19 virus emerge throughout the U.S., a renewed push is being made to get more Americans vaccinated.
articles.content:
As new variants of the COVID-19 virus emerge throughout the U.S., a renewed push is being made to get more Americans vaccinated.
